title: Looking to join a Team
body:
Want to join a team,

I am Plat 2 add me: Precise if you would like me to join ur team :)

I main adc and support

replies.body: Are you looking for a serious ranked team or just a casual norms team? I'd be happy to play norms with you man but I'm not too keen on ranked unless it's with a full team you feel me
